The claim originated from the website Wo: which published an article titled "Trump Orders 13 Obama Deep State Operatives Arrested For Treason" on August 6, 2017.
The article cited Breitbart: a conspiracy-minded website, as the source of information for the claim. However, there is no article on Breitbart supporting this claim.
White House spokeswoman Sarah Huckabee S: this goes all the way to the top." However, there is no evidence of her making such statements.
The claim was also found on another webs: which published an identical version of the article on August 1, 2017.
